name: Another Platformer Part 2 - Continued
description:
This is part 2 of the Another Platformer series. 

Please play part 1 before you play this one. 

Link for part 1 is https://ryanmouse.itch.io/platformer-hard.

Thanks to Alexandria Ehlers for her music Warped played in the background.

Once again the directions are....

Arrow keys to move. ("Up" key is jump.)

You can go over text!

Black springs = Tiny Character

Collision with spike = Nearest Checkpoint

Collision with floor = Nearest Checkpoint

Platform (Blue) = Solid, Not Moving

Platform (Red) = Breaking, Not Moving

Platform (Green) = Solid, Moving

Click "r" to restart!

Now, go ahead and play! If you enjoy, please comment and follow!
